line_1: The foulest Stain, so fair a Memory!
line_2: Oh, do not sully with a sanguine Dye,

line_1: But ev'ry tear shall scald thy memory.
line_2: Petronius! all the muses weep for thee,

line_1: To live in Air, and WALK in Memory;
line_2: That covet Dangers, and ride Post to die,

line_1: Your Virtues next inform'd my Memory,
line_2: Your Noble Nature, Love to Poetry,
